title: Direct Selling | FlexPay
summary: FlexPay offers an Invisible Recovery™ solution for direct selling businesses to optimize failed payment recovery, reduce customer churn, and increase revenue. It aims to improve cash flow and customer lifetime value by intelligently adapting to various payment decline reasons.
key_points: FlexPay Invisible Recovery™ for direct selling businesses
Reduces customer churn caused by failed payments
AI-powered and adapts to payment decline reasons
Optimizes autoship service and risk management
